channel.title: Deep Learning on Dheepak's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Deep Learning on Dheepak's blog

item.title: How I'm planning to get started on Deep Learning?
item.description: This post is to describe how I find the book Meta Learning: How To Learn Deep Learning And Thrive In The Digital World is giving me a hope and road map to learn Deep Learning. Not only learning DL and also where to go from there viz Kaggle. Who am I? I’m part of Data landscape for more than a decade now. I started as ETL developer, then evolved into Data Engineer.
